tropes.name: contract marriage
tropes.description: Two characters agree to a fake or contractual relationship that eventually blossoms into real love.

tropes.name: childhood friends
tropes.description: Leads share a history as childhood friends, which complicates or deepens their romance.

tropes.name: love triangle
tropes.description: A third person enters the romance, causing jealousy and rivalry.

tropes.name: amnesia
tropes.description: A character forgets their memories, usually erasing their love story until it’s rekindled.

tropes.name: hidden illness
tropes.description: A lead secretly suffers from a terminal or chronic illness, creating tension in the romance.

tropes.name: time travel
tropes.description: Leads travel across timelines or dimensions to rewrite fate or reunite with loved ones.

tropes.name: supernatural romance
tropes.description: Love story involves ghosts, goblins, magic, or other fantasy elements.

tropes.name: rich CEO heir
tropes.description: A wealthy chaebol heir falls for a humble, ordinary girl.

tropes.name: clumsy student
tropes.description: Female lead is quirky, clumsy, or naïve, often contrasting the male lead’s stoicism.

tropes.name: rival love interest
tropes.description: Another character actively pursues one lead, heightening the romantic conflict.

tropes.name: mysterious doctor
tropes.description: A skilled doctor with a troubled past or hidden secrets becomes a central figure.

tropes.name: secret identity
tropes.description: One or both leads conceal their true identity or background.
